## utils.Rect.contains() method

Tests whether this rectangle contains a x/y coordinate.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
contains(x: number, y: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number | The x coordinate to test for containment. |
|  y | number | The y coordinate to test for containment.  Whether this rectangle contains given coordinate. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
